matrix-project.description: This job builds the APARAPI Sample Sources using the chosen JDK on Linux

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_APARAPI_L
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: Uses the APARAPI.jar from the specified APARAPI_L build job.

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash #Copyright (c) 2014 Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. All rights reserved. #This script replaces the Version Number in the Samples header files #based on the MasterSampleVersion.csv
echo ---------------------------------REQUIRED VARIABLES---------------------------- echo MAJOR_NUMBER: $MAJOR_NUMBER echo MINOR_NUMBER: $MINOR_NUMBER echo SUBMINOR_NUMBER: $SUBMINOR_NUMBER echo MILESTONE: $MILESTONE echo PRODUCTVERSION: $PRODUCTVERSION echo VERSION: $VERSION echo FILES_TO_COPY: $FILES_TO_COPY echo PRODUCTNAME: $PRODUCTNAME
echo LABEL: $L
echo P4PORT: $P4PORT echo P4USER: $P4USER echo P4TICKET: $P4TICKET echo P4CLIENT: $P4CLIENT
echo MappingFile: $MappingFile
chmod +x P4Update.sh ./P4Update.sh $MappingFile
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #Check for the presence of MasterSampleVersion.csv, if not found, then exit Master=$WORKSPACE/samples/MasterSampleVersion.csv if [[ ! "$Master" ]]; then echo FAILURE: File: $Master not found exit 1 fi
#The MasterSampleVersion.csv file contains file names with Windows style back-slash as file delimiters, replace them with the Unix style forward slash sed -i 's/\\/\//g' "$Master" RetVal=$? if [[ $RetVal -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace Windows backslashes to Unix forward slashes in $WORKSPACE. exit $RetVal fi
#The file name in MasterSampleVersion.csv file contains full file path of files from a Perforce repo. The repo path needs to be replaced with the workspace where the file is checked out by Peforce. sed -i "s?\/\/depot\/stg\/app_sdk?$WORKSPACE?g" "$Master" RetVal=$? if [[ $RetVal -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace //depot/stg/app_sdk with $WORKSPACE fi
#File $Master exists, proceeding with parsing it and updating OLDIFS=$IFS IFS="," while read -r SampleName SampleVersion SampleSourceFile do if [ -e $SampleSourceFile ]; then echo Replacing AMD-APP-SDK-v2.9.1.1 with AMD-APP-SDK-v$PRODUCTVERSION.$SampleVersion in file: $SampleSourceFile sed -i.bak "s?AMD-APP-SDK-v2.9.1.1?AMD-APP-SDK-v$PRODUCTVERSION.$SampleVersion?g" "$SampleSourceFile" if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace AMD-APP-SDK-v2.9.1.1 with $PRODUCTVERSION.$SampleVersion in file: $SampleSourceFile fi fi done < $Master IFS=$OLDIFS

#!/bin/bash #This shell script compiles the Linux aparapi sources Retval=0
echo [INFO]ANT_HOME: ${ANT_HOME} echo [INFO]
APARAPI_ARCHIVE=$(readlink -f ${SAMPLE}_${T}-JDK${JDK}-${OSTYPE}-${PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD}_*.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION}) echo [INFO]Calling tar -jxvf $APARAPI_ARCHIVE tar -jxvf $APARAPI_ARCHIVE --exclude=*.so Retval=$? if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then #failure to extract echo [ERR]Failed to extract $APARAPI_ARCHIVE exit $Retval fi
export JAVA_HOME=/opt/jdk/${P}/jdk${JDK}.latest export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH export PATH=$ANT_HOME/bin:$PATH
echo [INFO]ANT_HOME: $ANT_HOME echo [INFO]JAVA_HOME: $JAVA_HOME echo [INFO]PATH: $PATH
export LIBAPARAPI=${WORKSPACE} chmod +x samples/${SAMPLE,,}/build.sh
SAMPLE_SC=${SAMPLE,,} samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/build.sh "$WORKSPACE/samples/${SAMPLE_SC}" Retval=$? if [ $Retval -eq 0 ]; then echo --------- ${SAMPLE} samples built successfully --------------- chmod -x samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/build.sh #Create the tar.bz2 archive for the aparapi samples ARCHIVE_NAME=$WORKSPACE/ComputeSDK-${OSTYPE}-build-${SAMPLE}-$PRODUCTVERSION-jdk${JDK}-${T}-${PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD}.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION} echo [INFO]Calling tar -jcvf $ARCHIVE_NAME samples --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/examples/*/*.bat --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/*.bat --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/*/*/*/*/*/*.class --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/*/*/*/*/*/*/*/*/*.class --exclude=samples/MasterSampleVersion.csv tar -jcvf $ARCHIVE_NAME samples --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/examples/*/*.bat --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/*.bat --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/*/*/*/*/*/*.class --exclude=samples/${SAMPLE_SC}/*/*/*/*/*/*/*/*/*.class --exclude=samples/MasterSampleVersion.csv else echo --------- ${SAMPLE} samples NOT built --------------- fi
exit $Retval
